description: This file defines a React component called NotesList that renders a searchable, keyboard-navigable list of notes. It manages filtering, keyboard navigation, and accessibility features, and interacts with other components like SearchBar, EmptyState, and NoteItem.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes = [], selectedId = null, onSelect, searchable = true, searchQuery = '', onSearch, onClearSearch, emptyMessage = 'No notes yet. Create a new note to get started.', notFoundMessage = 'No notes match your search.', ariaLabel = 'Notes list', })
methods.description: Main React component that renders and manages the notes list, including search, selection, and keyboard navigation.
